tl;dr: Great puzzle game! 

Long version:
This game improves on everything that made the first Portal game great. More puzzles, more story, more world building.
Maybe the tropes are a bit hashed out, sure, and maybe at some point the game becomes almost a bit too repetitive, introducing new mechanics well into the very end of the game - but as an overall experience few are the game that can compete with this one.
The writing is very nearly impeccable. The voice acting is superb. The puzzles are innovative and challenging, and surprisingly not repetitive! 
Playing it for the first time so long after its first release, it still looks crisp, and beautifully designed.
The soundtrack is immersive, and the little snippets of audio you're rewarded with as you correctly fly towards the exit make the solution of puzzles that much more rewarding. 
I'd highly recommend this game, even years after it has been released. It is an instant classic.

Good puzzles.

A fun and memorable game.

А хотя ловите : В играх серии Portal вам предстоит взять на себя роль Челл, молодой девушки, запертой в лабораториях Aperture Science. Ей предстоит решать разные головоломки в специальных камерах, собранных безумным искусственным интеллектом под названием ГЛаДОС. Для прохождения тестов Челл использует портальную пушку, разработанную Aperture Science, которая предназначена для создания разрывов в пространстве, названных порталами, они позволяют Челл быстро перемещаться или достигать труднодоступных мест.

Portal 2 is the sequel that has innovated and improved on every aspect of the original.  It has a single-player and a co-op mode which makes this a great value for your money and time.  

The premise remains the same -- you got a gun that creates portal and you are tasked by an AI director to get to the exit of each room. Now there are additional items and physics introduced that gives the puzzles a fresh coat of paint. Now the story has also been fleshed out and makes it an enjoyable journey to go on to learn about the auxiliary characters that surround Chell ( the protagonist).  The story also takes into account why there is a co-op mode and its a nice twist.

The co-op is a lot of fun with Valve thinking up the simple ways for random players and friends to interact with each other through the game.

THIS GAME IS SO GOOD

Expands on everything the first game presented without adding too much, which is often the case with sequels.  Truly a perfect experience.  The multiplayer is great and feels fun even when you stop and pick it back up over long periods of time.

传送门不仅仅是一个解谜游戏，从其中穿插了的细微细节可以知晓这完全是一部宏伟巨作。其剧情不仅与前一代有关联，且将valve的游戏世界观更进一步展开来叙述，更令人期待第三代（虽说不大可能了）。
  我是从2014年接触portal，现在入正后把一代通关花了3小时，二代至少有7小时（以前玩的都快忘记了），而且多人模式下的解谜更是引人入胜，非常推荐喜欢的人购买（最好搭一个好友一起玩）。
  其实游戏难度并不高，主要看你动脑有多快，对于操作来说要求还好吧，主要是在旧的光圈研究所里场景比较大，路不太好找。
Cannot believe it runs so perfectly on my old MacBook.  Amazing optimized system, Valve.

È un gioco meraviglioso, ha un buon gameplay, ha una campagna molto innovativa rispetto al primo portal, ha una funzione multigiocatore incredibile, basti solo pensare il fatto che tu possa fare dei livelli rompicapo che ti viene voglia di acquistarlo e giocarlo con dei tuoi amici fidati.
Con gli ultimi aggiornamenti hanno aggiunto la funzione di poter giocare altre camere test oltre a quelle del gioco e non vale solo per il singleplayer ma anche per il multiplayer.
È davvero un bel gioco, lo consiglio a tutti gli amanti della saga e a tutti coloro che amano i giochi rompicapo

Wow. Just wow.

For an old game this still holds a place in my heart. It's storyline, It's gameplay, the soundtrack.

I've completed this game at least 10 times now (I used to play on a different steam account) and every single playthrough has been fun.

The difficulties of the puzzles are not too light, not too hard. The co op modes are amazing with an interesting take on things.

I'd recommend this game to anyone.

Honestly, this is a great game. It takes a very simple idea of making 2 portals between that can one teleport and combines it with great game mechanics that results into masterpiece. One thing I want to embrace is the storyline from one of the most creative tutorials to breathtaking ending. And the jokes that are constantly thrown at you are simply hilarious.
